name: Apollo 69
description:
Is your life boring? Do you feel suicidal? Do you need that last push to finally finish it all? Well this game is right for you!

From the creators of awful student movies and that one forgotten unity project from years ago - we bring you the newest entry into the never ending hell pit that is the endless runner genre! Download our game now and we might not use your smartphone to mine the currently profitable crypto shitcoin!

PREMISE:

You are the pilot of the humanity's most important space mission. You job is to safely land the Apollo 69 craft on the surface of [REDACTED]. There are however many obstacles that will try to sabotage your mission! From asteroids to failed soviet spacecraft wrecks - everything will try to stop you from completing your mission!

FEATURES:

At least 4 different obstacles to dodge!

3 different ship skins to unlock!

Your own highscore to beat!

God awful soundtrack!
